

# R Markdown

In this workshop we will see how to generate a report in .html format using R Markdown. Reports written using R Markdown allow you to combine narrative that youâ€™ve written along with R code chunks, and the output associated with those code chunks all in one knitted document. The assignments for this unit need to be produced using R Markdown.
